trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of asymmetric signature deformatters derive.
trans-unit.target: Representerer abstrakt basisklasse som alle implementeringer av asymmetriske signatur deformatters avledet.

trans-unit.source: Asymmetric signature deformatters verify the digital signatures that are created using implementations of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: Asymmetriske signatur deformatters bekrefte de digitale signaturene som er opprettet ved hjelp av implementeringer av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette en forekomst av en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: Application code will create a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Programmet koden vil opprette en ny forekomst av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use implementations of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling an implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk implementeringer av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>til å angi nøkkel og hash-algoritmen før du kaller en implementering av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, angir du hash-algoritmen som skal brukes for å bekrefte signaturen.

trans-unit.source: You must set a hash algorithm before calling an implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en nummeralgoritme før du kaller en implementering av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på hash-algoritmen som skal brukes for å bekrefte signaturen.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the public key to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, angir du fellesnøkkelen skal brukes for å bekrefte signaturen.

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling an implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en nøkkel før du kaller en implementering av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of an implementation of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av en implementering av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> som inneholder fellesnøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies the signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, kontrollerer du signaturen for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: You must specify a public key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi en fellesnøkkel og en nummeralgoritme før du kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The data signed with `rgbSignature`.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som er signert med `rgbSignature`.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified for `rgbHash`.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen bekreftes `rgbHash`.

trans-unit.source: if rgbSignature matches the signature computed using the specified hash algorithm and key on rgbHash; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis rgbSignature samsvarer med signaturen beregnet ved hjelp av angitte nummeralgoritmen og nøkkelen på rgbHash ; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Verifies the signature from the specified hash value.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer signaturen fra den angitte hash-verdien.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the hash algorithm to be used before verifying the signature of the input hash algorithm value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir nummeralgoritmen som skal brukes før bekrefte signaturen for verdien for inndata hash-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to verify the signature.
trans-unit.target: Nummeralgoritmen skal brukes til å verifisere filens signatur.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen bekreftes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the signature is valid for the hash; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis signaturen er ugyldig for hash-koden; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The hash parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The hash parameter is .
